page.title: 06THE MINERS' STRIKE 1984-5
page.content: During the {miner's strike }my family lived on Â£18.00 a week.We found it very hard to believe that there would be no more sweets from 5 March 1984 until 5 March 1985. We had a parcel delivered every Friday of each week. We had a tin of soup,a tin of carrots and a tin of spaghetti,beans or ravioli. We also had a tin of meat and potatoes. We found that the hardest part of the strike was when christmas came along.My parents explained that I could not have all that I wanted. We also found it hard to pay our bills. When we phoned the place where we paid our bills they froze them.So when the end of the strike came,we started paying our bills again.
